Rodrigo Siqueira de Souza

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/3968198104538119
  • Última atualização do currículo em 22/12/2016

I'm a licensed biologist from University of Brazil (Federal University of Rio de Janeiro--UFRJ), M.Sc in Neuroscience by the Biomedical Sciences Institute of University of Brazil (ICB/UFRJ) and doing my Ph.D in Cybernetics at University of Reading. Experienced in Computational Neuroscience, Evolution of the Brain, Bioinformatics (Molecular Docking and Rational Drug Design), Astrobiology and Paleontology (most three-Dimentional Modeling usages and vertebrates paleontology). My current research is about cultured neuronal networks linked to a robot body, we will train it to learn some motor skills. The main objective being to make a disruption in the neuronal culture in order to simulate a stroke to finally treat it with stem cells and see in detail how the treatment enables the robot regain its previous capabilities. This research is being conducted at the Brain Embodiment Lab at the University of Reading under the mentoring of Prof. Slawomir Nasuto and Dr. Evangelos Delivopoulos. It is being funded by the National Counsel of Technological and Scientific Development of the Brazilian with a scholarship as part of the Science Without Borders program. (Texto informado pelo autor)
